Just to Clarify;
The movie is in its original Chinese,
There are Portugese, Spanish and English subtitles. However, depending on your player, you may need to rename the English subtitle files to get them to play. Just rename them the same as the .avi file but with .srt extension. (You may have to move or delete the Portugese subtitles files).
Great movie, many thanks to to the uploader and diligent seeders.
